newsitem.title: UK: NWE OIL PRODUCTS MIXED, FUEL BARGES EDGE UP $1.
newsitem.headline: NWE OIL PRODUCTS MIXED, FUEL BARGES EDGE UP $1.

text.p: NWE oil products were mixed on Tuesday morning with heavy fuel edging higher but other products steady.
Heavy fuel gained $1 a tonne traded from $94.50 to $95.50 on Rotterdam barges but swaps were little changed at $93.75 for August and September.
Gas oil edged up 25 cents to $168.25 on the IPE for August but that contract expires at midday on Tuesday. September was 25 cents at $170 but premiums for Rotterdam barges were unchanged at 75 cents.
